text.title: Wikinews interviews Chilean Paralympic skier Jorge Migueles

head.s: Wikinews interviews Chilean Paralympic skier Jorge Migueles

caption.s:
Wikinews reporter
LauraHale
interviews Chilean Paralympic skier Jorge Migueles

p.s:
Recently ,
Wikinews
spent time with with
Chilean
Paralympic
skier
Jorge Migueles who was in
Copper Mountain
,
Colorado
for the
IPC
Nor-Am Cup .
I 'm interviewing Jorge Migueles , he is here from Chile .

And you 're from
Santiago
.
Yes , from Santiago .

What you 're what
classification
?
, I have a prosthetic I ski with , special for skiing , I have an amputation below the knee .
When people think of skiing , they do n't automatically think Chile as a great place for skiers , and developing skiers .
How did the skier [ Jorge Migueles ] from Chile become a skier ?

Yes it is a good place because all the big teams —
USA
,
Austria
,
Canada
— go for training there and they go [ ... ] in September because the snow is very hard for training , very icy , and it is very close to Santiago , to the airport , it is more easy for the logistics for the team .
I take it that you really like skiing ?
Yeah .
Do you do any other sports ?

Yes , I competed in
triathlon
, but only for a hobby .
I got training in Santiago before to come here , to ski[ ? ] here and one , two months in Europe .
So the triathlon helps you with your skiing ?
Yeah .

I take it your taking to go to
Sochi
?
Yeah , I try .
Has your country [ Chile ] won any Paralympic medals in the winter games ?

No , never , neither[ ? ]
olympic
nor paralympic .
So you want to be the first winter Paralympian medal from your country ?
I try that .
Very difficult .
Do you get government support for the winter Paralympic side ?

Not yet , but I try and get support from the government because in Chile all the sport in the summer in Santiago 2014 is all the sport in the summer is all they reimburse[ ? ] , the monies go there , in the winter it 's more difficult .
But I try that .
Is winter sport popular in Chile ?

Yeah , it 's popular , but it 's very expensive to practice skiing or
snowboard
.
The only other major news story that people know about in Chile is the earthquake , that did n't impact you that much you at all ?
Yes , a lot , because when [ ... ] had to stay here in United States training , and seeing in the news the earthquake , was very hard .
And your family and everything was okay , with that ?
Yes , they 're okay .
Is there anything people who know nothing about Paralympic sport in Chile should know ?
In London , in the past Olympic Game , one person with disability [ ... ] , he won gold medal in London . [ ... ]
He was the first Paralympic to win a medal in the history of Chile .
And now the people know this movement [ The Paralympics ] .
That 's very cool .
Okay .
Thank you very , very much .
Thank you .
